trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is placed in the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> é colocado no estouro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o [Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is permanently shown in the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> permanentemente é mostrado no estouro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> drifts between the main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> as required if space is not available on the main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> estiver dessincronizado relação entre principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> e o estouro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> como necessário se não há espaço disponível no principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is never a candidate for the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> nunca é um candidato para o estouro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> cannot fit on the main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, it will not be shown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> não puder ser ajustado principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>, ele não será mostrado.
